thread.title: Walling Off China Won’t Erase U.S. Trade Deficits

author: Nathaniel Taplin
title: Walling Off China Won’t Erase U.S. Trade Deficits
text:
Lurking behind Thursday’s headlines on steel and aluminum tariffs—relatively small parts of U.S. trade—is the threat of much bigger ructions to come.
President Donald Trump wants China to cut its trade surplus with the U.S. by $100 billion or about one-third. Failure to deliver could presumably result in wide-ranging tariffs after the conclusion of the administration’s investigation into China’s intellectual-property practices, which is expected in the coming weeks.
...
